title: When temperatures drop, Siberian Miscanthus  plants surpass main bioenergy variety

title_detail.value: When temperatures drop, Siberian Miscanthus  plants surpass main bioenergy variety

summary: Miscanthus is a popular, sustainable, perennial feedstock for bioenergy production that thrives on marginal land in temperate regions. A new study assessed Miscanthus collected on a Siberian expedition to identify three Miscanthus plants with exceptional photosynthetic performance in chilling temperatures that outstrip the industry favorite by as much as 100 percent.
